sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Carousel,Row,Col,Image} from 'react-bootstrap' import Meta from '../components/Meta' const HomeScreens = () => { return ( <>

Welcome To Vivokal

The Place where you find local Entreprenuers and their products and services.



As the world surrendered to a global pandemic, our borderless lives were replaced with the need to look inwards. However while the world recuperates – and rightly so – the extraordinary COVID-19 situation has forced us to take a simple step back to our roots. Bringing local entrepreneurs and indigenous-influenced industries into the spotlight, the recent push for Indian brands has been a blessing in disguise. Not only has it helped replenish the national economy but also championed its creativity and sustainability. Indian designers across the spectrum have begun championing native styles through their respective mediums. Despite being a way of perpetuating the country’s rich culture, the new campaign has upheld the livelihood of the industry’s real backbone – countless weavers, craftspeople and tailors that bring the Indian ideal into reality. Continuing our push to be #VocalForLocal, Vivokal is paying ode to remarkable local entrepreneurs that are promoting Indian sensibilities through mediums of arts, handicrafts, services and food.




#LOCALFOODS

The Taste Of India

#LOCALHANDICRAFTS

The Vibe Of India

#LOCALSERVICES

The Help Of India



Why Shop Local?

Love Where You Live

For every Rupee spent at a Local Business, about ₹0.89stays in the community.

#PURCHASEWITHPURPOSE

Supporl local Support small

When you buy from a small business,an actual person does a little happy dance.

#VIZAGVOCALFORLOCAL

For the Love of Local

Love local and Live local

#SHOPLOCAL





Our Users Opinions


“Going local does not mean walling off the outside world. It Means nurturing locally owned businesses which use local resources sustainably and serve primarily local consumers.”




Hemanth Mali

“When you visit an independent local business,You celebrate the uniqueness of your community and encourage local prosperity.”




Shanthi Sree

“Money spent locally stays local, Environmentally better and Backbone of any town or city.”




Surya Rapo


Our Initiatives and Missions



Contact Us

Reach out to us for Associations and Collaborations at:

vivokalvizag@gmail.com



Connect Us On

) } export default HomeScreens
